_source.short_desc: Wufoo makes it easy to create custom online forms so you can collect data, RSVPs, payments and more, all without writing code.
_source.long_desc: Wufoo makes it easy to create custom online forms so you can collect data, RSVPs, payments and more, all without writing a single line of code. Trusted by more than 3 million users, including companies like Amazon & Disney, Wufoo has an award-winning form builder interface, easy customization, 400+ templates and reporting! Whether you're embedding your forms on your website, or sharing a direct link, Wufoo has you covered.
_source.pricing_details:
Starter plan: $19/month or $169/year
Professional plan: $39/month or $349/year
Advanced plan: $99/month or $889/year
Ultimate plan: $249/month or $2199/year
_source.target_audience: Wufoo is for anyone and everyone that has a need to quickly build amazing online forms.

category_features.name: Data Analysis Tools
category_features.definition: Analyze survey results via statistical testing or crosstabs directly within the software

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Mobile Survey
category_features.definition: Distribute a survey via mobile devices

category_features.name: Offline Response Collection
category_features.definition: Allow participants to fill out and submit the survey without internet connection

category_features.name: Question Branching
category_features.definition: Show participants specific questions based on their answer to a previous question (ie. different paths)

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Site Intercept Survey
category_features.definition: Survey popup over a webpage to specific users based on their behavior

category_features.name: Skip Logic
category_features.definition: Avoid showing participants irrelevant questions as determined by the answer to a previous question

category_features.name: Support Audio/Images/Video
category_features.definition: Allow media to be embedded in the question or answer options

category_features.name: URL Customization
category_features.definition: Change the URL of your survey to fit your branding or survey title

category_features.name: Abbreviation Detection
category_features.definition: Automatically comprehend data abbreviation terms

category_features.name: Data Capture and Transfer
category_features.definition: Collecting data and sharing/storing in another location

category_features.name: Data Quality Control
category_features.definition: Process for different types of data to be checked for accuracy

category_features.name: Data Replication
category_features.definition: Process of copying and storing data

category_features.name: Data Retrieval
category_features.definition: Obtaining data from a database management system

category_features.name: Image Capture
category_features.definition: Process images and automatically scan for data

category_features.name: Mis-Keyed Variation Detection
category_features.definition: Detects when a user has input/keyed data incorrectly

category_features.name: Phonetic Variation Detection
category_features.definition: Detects variations in pronunciation or variations in spelling across regions.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
related_products.features: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.

related_products.short_desc: Get valuable feedback or conduct research online with Jotform's customizable, mobile-friendly surveys, questionnaires, and polls.
related_products.features: Whether you need to conduct market research or obtain valuable feedback for your business, Jotform makes it easier than ever to create powerful online surveys that get answers fast. Build engaging and easy-to-fill surveys, questionnaires, polls, and more without any coding. Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.

related_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
related_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

related_products.short_desc: Create engaging, platform-independent and beautiful surveys. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to collect feedback.
related_products.features:
SurveyLegend is the next generation of online surveys engaging, platform-independent & beautiful. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to create mobile-friendly, gorgeous surveys.

Now you can create great-looking surveys on your PC or tablet, customize the look of your survey however you like, & display collected data with eye-catching & insightful graphics. Creating questionnaires is done simply by drag & drop, & you don't need to be a market research expert to use our tool.

related_products.short_desc: Collect more useful feedback with surveys that look and feel great. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps.
related_products.features: Get more insights and useful feedback using Typeform: over 1.5 million typeforms are submitted every single day. Why? Our forms look amazing (and are fully customizable to your brand), plus the smooth and responsive UI makes filling them in a pleasure. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps lets you send data automatically wherever you need it. Plus, it's quick and simple to make a typeform: get started with our easy form builder, and launch your survey in minutes.

related_products.short_desc: Birdeye Surveys is an easy-to-use product that turns customer feedback into revenue and is part of the Experience Marketing platform.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated
survey requests, and ask for reviews [and referrals roadmap Q2] along with your survey. Set up email alerts
to notify specific locations/employees when survey responses come in. Survey Insights analyzes customer
feedback at scale using Athena, a Natural Language Processing engine.

related_products.short_desc: Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar!
related_products.features:
Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar.
Hotjar Surveys allow you to ask your site visitors an unlimited number of questions, from an unlimited number of respondents. On-site surveys appear as pop-up widgets on your webpage(s), and external link surveys appear as stand-alone pages with their own designated web address (URL). Use our pre-built templates or create your own.

related_products.short_desc: Online survey tool that lets you create unlimited surveys, distribute them and analyze the data  with ease.
related_products.features:
Zoho Survey is easy-to-use online survey and questionnaire building software. Our features are scalable to suit yourneeds, with everything essential to create surveys, distribute them, and analyze responses.Survey panels are also available, if you needdata from specific demographics.
Informed decisions are just around the corner.Learn more about Zoho Survey at https://www.zoho.com/survey/.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkTango enables companies to give their employees a voice and easily collect feedback for any purpose to support actionable insight.
similar_products.features:
The WorkTango platform creates a space for employees to have a voice and helps companies easily gather frequent feedback for any engagement, transformation, or feedback initiative. 

Using data science and natural language understanding, actionable insights from employee feedback are served in real-time to Human Resources, C-Suite executives, and people leaders. 

The results are quicker insight, better people actionable decisions, and a more aligned and engaged workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey software and no per-response fees.
similar_products.features: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey and customer feedback software that's flexible enough for each team to use it their way, while still giving IT full security control and insight. Alchemer won Fastest Implementation, Easiest Setup, and Best Meets Requirements from users at G2.com. Get the feedback you need with the most question types and no per-response fees.

similar_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
similar_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.

similar_products.short_desc: GetFeedback is the #1-rated feedback solution for Salesforce. Seamlessly connect all of your CX surveys for actionable insight.
similar_products.features: With GetFeedback for Salesforce, you can automatically collect customer feedback at critical touchpoints in the customer journey. Pull more context into your surveys then push feedback into Salesforce so you can measure valuable customer metrics like NPS, CSAT, or CES and take intelligent action to improve your customer experience. GetFeedback customers see a 240% increase in response rates and 7x faster implementation than other cx survey platforms.

similar_products.short_desc: Tremendous is the best platform to offer rewards and incentives to survey participants.
similar_products.features: Tremendous is the ultimate platform to maximize survey participation at a global scale. Incentivize survey takers with instant digital rewards, including gift cards, prepaid Visa? cards, cash and more. Buy, track and manage survey incentives individually and in bulk via the Tremendous platform, or automatically by integrating with our API.

similar_products.short_desc: Coach, motivate, and empower your employees to make every customer experience awesome.
similar_products.features:
Get more repeat purchases and referrals by improving your customers' experiences. Collect real-time customer feedback to motivate, engage, and coach your service providers so they can deliver exceptional customer experiences, every time. 

Discover why AskNicely is the leading Customer Experience Management solution. Learn more at asknicely.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile, AI-powered platform to give every decision-maker in your organization the power to reshape your customer experience, your product, or your industry. Leveraging 20 plus years of expertise and over 55 billion responses by 6 billion respondents, Momentive is powered by real human inputs, based on proven best practices and delivers exceptional user experience. Trusted by over 98% of Fortune 500 companies.

similar_products.short_desc: HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance.
similar_products.features:
HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance, instantly and over time.

Our range of easy-to-use feedback-collecting Smileys, analytics, and reporting helps companies make informed decisions based on real-time, continuous data. Know how you're doing, what works (and what doesn't), and when and where to improve.

Additional Success services included, such as onboarding, customer support, Help Center, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based market research solution for businesses that helps collect, share and collaborate over research-based data.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Enterprise empowers businesses to capture and act on critical feedback to drive growth and innovation at scale with advanced security and compliance features. Integrate survey feedback with your technology stack to enrich decision-making and automate workflows. SurveyMonkey's products, enterprise solutions, and integrations enable more than 335,000 organizations to deliver better customer experiences, increase employee retention, and unlock growth and innovation.

similar_products.short_desc: Uncover the hidden drivers of engagement & measure the pulse of your company culture with Leapsome?s employee engagement surveys.
similar_products.features:
With Leapsome you can run engagement surveys, pulse surveys, and collect eNPS to gather meaningful feedback and insights from employees. With the powerful survey analytics you can understand the engagement drivers that impact performance levels and employee churn so you can develop and retain your team.

Furthermore, Leapsome is an all-in-one people management platform used by CEOs and HR teams to not only drive employee engagement but also performance and learning as well.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Experience software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Experience tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Experience software (also known as CXM or CEM) helps to collect, organize and track customer feedback. This software includes a variety of applications for collecting customer opinions to tools for converting text-based feedback into numeric information that can later be used for marketing purposes. Customer Experience software is related to Survey software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Loyalty software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IVR software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IVR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Market Research software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Market Research tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Market Research software helps researchers effectively recruit, survey and maintain panel members and gather data. Using this software can yield consumer insight into marketing appeal, promotions effectiveness, product development, and customer service. A single interface can control all panel functions, including frequently used questions, panel invitations, questionnaire design, data gathering and export, and member database. Managers of online surveys and focus groups are common users of this type of software. Market Research software is related to Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top NPS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of NPS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: NPS software helps organizations implement campaigns to measure net promoter scores. NPS is a customer and employee satisfaction benchmark calculated using surveys. The final score can be used to gauge loyalty to the brand or organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Polling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Polling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Polling software automates feedback solicitation and opinion collection, often in real time, from a wide range of audiences through means as diverse as telephones, mobile devices, and other tools.

supported_countries.name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

pricing_plans.description: This plan is available for free of cost

pricing_plans.name: Starter
pricing_plans.description: The plan is billed annually at $14.08 per month.

pricing_plans.name: Professional

pricing_plans.name: Advanced
pricing_plans.description: The plan is billed annually at $74.08 per month totalling $889.

pricing_plans.name: Ultimate
pricing_plans.description: The plan is billed annually at $183.25 per month totalling $2199.

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Process of moving and separately storing data that is not actively used or continuous storage of data for compliance purposes

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Drag & Drop
category_features.definition: Click and object and drag and drop through an interface

category_features.name: Forms Creation & Design
category_features.definition: Create and design new forms from scratch using templates and design tools, or scan and convert existing forms into the system

category_features.name: Full Text Search
category_features.definition: Look through entire documents, not just sections

category_features.name: Process/Workflow Automation
category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflow

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

related_products.short_desc: Create forms easily and turn responses into workflows on monday.com's open platform so your team can handle requests all in one place.
related_products.features: Digitize your forms and turn responses into workflows easily with monday.com's open platform without any coding. Create forms in minutes with pre-made templates, and share a link to get responses from non-devs, clients, or customers. Compile responses into a visual board if you need to track the status of open tickets in one place. Or, generate reports from replies to make better decisions about your priorities. Then add automations to offload repetitive tasks and streamline the entire process.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: UpKeep is rated the #1 mobile-first Forms Automation Software to streamline work orders, facility, and asset management.
related_products.features: UpKeep's Forms Automation Software is rated the #1 mobile-first maintenance and asset management solution for your team. From your desktop to your phone and even your tablet, UpKeep is easily accessible from anywhere at any time. Create work orders on-the-go, get notifications when tasks are updated, and receive alerts straight from your app when assets go down making your business run more efficiently than ever before.

related_products.short_desc: Ideal for businesses of all sizes, it is a form building tool that helps users create survey forms while also reviewing submissions.
related_products.features: Trusted by over 10 million users, Jotform's form builder is the easy way to create and publish online forms from any device. The company offers 10,000+ ready-made form templates, 100+ integrations to 3rd party apps, and advanced design features making it the leading online form builder for organizations all over the world. It's popularly used to create payment forms, lead generation forms, registration forms, contact forms, application forms, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Teams in nearly every department across your organization can now easily create and share forms or rmbed them on your website
related_products.features:
PandaDoc created PandaDoc Forms for a number of teams like Sales, HR, Operations, Legal, and more. Easily create and share a Form by embedding it on your website or share the Form via a direct link. Zero coding required and you don?t even need a customer?s email address. 
Features like editable templates, specific signing order, and payments are also available for Forms. 
We?re pretty confident PandaDoc Forms will be the easiest form builder you?ll ever use.

related_products.short_desc: An all-in-one online PDF editor, built-in e-signature and fillable form builder.
related_products.features: pdfFiller is a GDPR compliant online PDF editor, e-signature manager and fillable PDF form builder in a single web app. Edit and e-sign PDF documents online, create fillable PDF forms and send them for signing. Share documents via email, social media or host them on your company's website. Fax, print or send PDFs via USPS right from your pdfFiller  account. Get completed copies of submitted and signed PDF forms and automatically extract data to an Excel file, CRM or database.

related_products.short_desc: Pardot's lead management features CRM integration, email marketing, lead nurturing, lead scoring, and ROI reporting.
related_products.features: Pardot empowers marketing and sales teams to work together to engage buyers, close deals, and grow relationships. Pardot's lead management features CRM integration, email marketing, lead nurturing, lead scoring, and ROI reporting to help marketing and sales teams work together to generate and qualify sales leads, shorten sales cycles, and track marketing ROI. Users can track all prospects on a site, qualify sales leads, and utilize social selling.

related_products.short_desc: Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams.
related_products.features:
Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams. We help teams share their core processes, then transform them into powerful no-code workflows.

Start with employee onboarding to set up new hires for success, then build all sorts of workflows like employee onboarding, client onboarding, and tenant screening.

Manage your team wiki and company handbook 100% free.

Join Salesforce, Colliers, Drift, and 3,000+ other businesses who use Process Street today.

related_products.short_desc: Twilio SendGrid is the leading cloud-based email delivery platform, trusted by over 80,000 of the world's fastest-growing brands.
related_products.features:
Twilio SendGrid is a leader in customer communications. Our trusted, cloud-based email delivery platform helps marketers and developers send with confidence. We are trusted by over 80,000 global customers, big and small, to drive engagement and growth through their email program.

In addition to our award-winning API, Twilio SendGrid's Marketing Campaigns offers powerful, one-to-many sending, straightforward segmentation, flexible and frustration-free campaign editing and actionable analytics.

related_products.short_desc: Easy-to-make forms that are fully automated while also fun and conversational.
related_products.features: Create stylish forms with automatically generated reports and useful insights. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps let you automate your workflow and send collected data wherever you need it to be. Typeforms are responsive and fully customizable to your brand, giving a personalized experience while also being fully automated. The easy form builder means you can build and launch one in minutes, and it's all protected with enterprise-level security.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is #1 free form builder used by over 8 million companies worldwide. External (website) and internal (requests) forms.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is #1 free form builder used by over 8 million companies worldwide. External (website) and internal (requests) forms. Natively integrated with Bitrix24 CRM and form automation features.

similar_products.short_desc: ProntoForms make real-time, accurate data collection quick and easy. Automate your business processes with robust mobile forms.
similar_products.features: Empower your field employees to reliably complete complex inspections, audits, and other tasks on the first visit. ProntoForms is the leader in enterprise-grade mobile forms. Our forms automation solution is easy to deploy and scalable. ProntoForms' no-code solution integrates seamlessly with your back-office systems and cloud services. Trust us to help you make real-time, accurate data collection fast and easy, even offline.

similar_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
similar_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

similar_products.short_desc: Launch, manage, measure, and grow your grants and social impact programs with Submittable's intuitive, flexible cloud-based platform.
similar_products.features: Submittable powers you with tools to launch, measure, and grow your social impact programs, locally and globally. From grants and corporate social responsibility programs to awards and scholarships. The start-to-finish platform makes your workflow smarter and more efficient, leading to better decisions and bigger impact. Easily report on success, and learn for the future-Submittable is flexible and powerful enough to grow alongside your programs.

similar_products.short_desc: Start a FREE TRIAL and join 25K orgs that use our no-code form builder to automate critical workflows. Plans start at $50/month.
similar_products.features: Join more than 25K orgs with a FREE TRIAL of Formstack Forms, a drag-and-drop online form builder, and reach optimal digital maturity as described in the 2022 State of Digital Maturity: Advancing Workflow Automation report. Save up to 18 hrs per week by enabling anyone in your org to create online forms, collect data, and automate processes without code. We support HIPAA compliance and offer 100s of templates + integrations for apps like Salesforce, MailChimp, and PayPal. Plans start at $50/mo.

similar_products.short_desc: Enables anyone to build web forms, workflow applications, surveys and detailed reporting without writing any code.
similar_products.features: PerfectForms is a feature-rich, web-based development environment - complete with pixel-perfect forms, form automation and powerful reporting capabilities - that lets you quickly build and deploy a wide variety of business applications, all without writing a single line of code.  You can build engaging, visually rich forms, design simple or complex workflows, send automatic notifications and escalations, create impressive drill-down reports, and even integrate with external systems.

similar_products.short_desc: FastField is an extremely flexible mobile forms solution to collect data and automate your digital forms workflow.
similar_products.features: FastField is a mobile forms automation solution for efficient and accurate data collection. FastField allows for offline data capture to achieve a completely paperless workflow. Build highly customizable digital forms for Android, iOS and Web without any prior coding experience. FastField is ideal for audits, inspections, safety reports, and any other custom business forms. With FastField you can integrate proprietary data to pre-populate forms and automatically deliver custom reports.

similar_products.short_desc: The simplest eSign & document completion solution for businesses that demand fast signatures, form building and  document collections
similar_products.features:
***Ideal for Consumer (B2C) focused businesses ***
*Dear Students - we do not have student plans. We do not provide affiliate links*

Highest eSign, and eForm Automation completion rate. 

Instantly collect eSignatures, build HTML forms (eForms), supporting documents, while on a call. 

With ad-hoc documents, or pre-formatted templates.

Via text/SMS or email (eliminate needless 'envelope' expense)- get e-Signatures on the spot.

Use through API or stand-alone. Integrations including Salesforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Ideal for businesses of all sizes, it is a form building tool that helps users create survey forms while also reviewing submissions.
similar_products.features: Trusted by over 10 million users, Jotform's form builder is the easy way to create and publish online forms from any device. The company offers 10,000+ ready-made form templates, 100+ integrations to 3rd party apps, and advanced design features making it the leading online form builder for organizations all over the world. It's popularly used to create payment forms, lead generation forms, registration forms, contact forms, application forms, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile app for completing inspections, audits, safety reports, orders, and many other tasks. Easy to use, enterprise grade.
similar_products.features:
Forms On Fire is your mobile app for accurate inspections, audits, safety reports, orders, and many other tasks.

Save time with pre-filled fields using data from your systems. Save time by eliminating travel back to the office. Save 100% of the time it takes to re-enter, re-assemble, file, and distribute forms to those who need them.

With enterprise-grade security, connections to thousands of systems, and ridiculously helpful customer service, you will delight your management team.

similar_products.short_desc: Free online form builder with advanced capabilities that are sophisticated enough for developers, yet simple enough for novices.
similar_products.features: Cognito Forms is an advanced online form builder that boasts an intuitive, user-friendly interface and the most robust set of free features on the market. Designed from the ground up for today's Internet, the platform delivers extremely powerful features; including document merging, file uploads, repeating sections, save & resume, conditional logic, and integrated payments. Seamlessly embed your forms onto your website, and get notified via email whenever new entries are submitted.

similar_products.short_desc: Collect data quickly and accurately with smart and intuitive digital forms using the Mobile Impact Platform.
similar_products.features: Collect data quickly and accurately right from the start with digital forms using the Mobile Impact Platform. Build highly customizable digital forms for Android, iOS, and Web - no coding experience required. Preload your relevant data and quickly capture text, photos, barcodes, GPS coordinates, voice, signatures, and more. Streamline your process today to increase efficiency, reduce processing time, and improve accuracy.

similar_products.short_desc: Switch on forms automation for legal professionals with Thomson Reuters? HighQ.
similar_products.features: HighQ's modern, adaptable, and continuously-learning legal workflow platform delivers an open and scalable foundation, embedded machine intelligence and analytics, and smart integration points with firm-critical applications. Dramatically improve how you plan, organize, track, and complete work more efficiently with personalized client portals and real-time access and insights on legal project work, ready-to-use task lists and templates, and automated workflow-enabled legal process maps.

similar_products.short_desc: With over two million landing pages at an average conversion rate of over 16%, Instapage is helping leading brands across 100 countries
similar_products.features: Instapage is the world's most advanced landing page platform, helping digital advertisers create more relevant and impactful advertising by making it easy to build conversion-optimized landing pages in minutes. With Instapage, marketers can maximize conversions by creating, personalizing, optimizing landing pages at scale, automatically connecting ads with relevant post-click pages, and delivering insights to drive the highest growth possible from digital ad campaigns.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Process Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Process Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Process Management software enables companies to model, deploy, optimize, and manage business processes. Business Process Management solutions offer a collaborative, continuous conduit through which to institute changes and distribute information throughout an enterprise. Organizations use these applications to coordinate their business environment, schedule and synchronize changes, test the effectiveness of new strategies, and institutionalize best practices. Business Process Management software is related to Systems Integration software and Workflow Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contract Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contract Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contract Management software automates the creation, tracking, and monitoring of contracts and agreements. Contract Management software also allows for the company-wide sharing of contract documents and management of differing document versions. These contract management applications often provide top-down control and monitoring of contract status, key dates, and personnel responsibilities. Contract Management software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Document Management software automates the process of managing documents from creation to storage to distribution throughout an enterprise, increasing efficiency and reducing the cost and clutter of maintaining paper records. Document Management applications provide solutions for a wide range of document needs from low specificity, high volume items such as standard forms to highly specific, low volume items such as one-to-one correspondence. Document Management software is related to Digital IT Asset Management software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top PDF Editor software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of PDF Editor tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: PDF Editor software can be used to create, edit, convert, and share PDF documents. The software allows users to edit text and images within PDFs, rearrange pages, password-protect files, electronically sign forms, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Survey software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Survey tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Survey software enables the efficient design and management of electronic surveys, polls, and questionnaires for market research, measuring customer satisfaction, and collecting employee feedback, along with many other applications. Survey software automates designing, scheduling, publishing, and conducting surveys while featuring a variety of user feedback formats including: radio buttons, check boxes, drop-down menus, and free-form text fields. Survey solutions also accommodate a variety of methodological approaches and provide data reporting tools. Survey software is related to Business Intelligence software and Reporting software.
